member.name: T:RyanJuan.Minerva.Common.MinervaCore
member.summary:
Core project for RyanJuan.Minerva.
Should not be used directly, use other subset of RyanJuan.Minerva which implement for various database instead, such as RyanJuan.Minerva.SqlClient, RyanJuan.Minerva.Odbc etc.

member.name: M:RyanJuan.Minerva.Common.MinervaCore.AddWithValues(System.Data.Common.DbParameterCollection,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Adds the new instance of to which the is constructed using properties of the input objects.
When constructing instances, the value of will be set from properties of input object. If the property has , will be used as parameter name. If the property has multiple , multiple instance will be create. Aslo if the property has and set to , will be used as parameter name to create an additional instance. At last, if none of the above condition are met, the property name will be used as parameter name.
If parameter with the same name has already exists in , that property will be ignore.
After instance is created, parameter type will be set before the value is set. If the property has , will be used as parameter type, otherwise this method will take the property's type and convert to corresponding .
The will be thrown if the of parameter is not valid.
member.param: The objects which use to construct parameter.

member.param: (Optional) Lenght limit for column in database.
